ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Natural stats for a 31st level bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and Welcome, Something for you to do would be get Lambent Armor.  The class specific armor quests were designed to be completed by players and groups
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and Welcome,

Something for you to do would be get Lambent Armor. The class specific
armor quests were designed to be completed by players and groups of players
in the mid 30's to 40's. And it's fun to actually go around and get the
items and do the quests (as opposed to "/auc WTB: full lambent" in Greater
Spamdark or East Commonspam. Full lambent is decent stuff for bard until he
can get to 48-52 and be doing Plane of Hate raids.

Shada: I too used to hear that having sta at 100+ would circumvent the bad
effects when your sta bar id depleted. I think that they have (stealth
nerf) changed this recently. Only last week, I had first hand experience
with a 56 warrior who has sta way over 100 and when his sta bar depleted,
you could see a noticeable slow down in his attack speed (and when he got a
sta replenish buff, you could see it get noticable faster.) Even so, I would
reccommend to ppl starting bards that they max out sta then put the rest in
dex or str (forget cha - your cha is prolly fine and easy enough to boost
with jewel craft bracers etc.) Sta adds hps and every little bit helps.

Sylly Songsynger
Virtuoso
<Mercenary Force>
Somewhere on Innoruuk...
http://www.mercenaryforce.com


-----Original Message-----
From: Onur Yildirim [mailto:onur.yildirim@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 01, 2001 10:20 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Natural stats for a 31st level bard?


Hiyas,

My first and still the only character in eq is a bard and because I am a
casual player I could just advance to the 31st level in some 6 months. We
founded a guild in Morrell Thule and the guild is faring hell better than me
in comparison. Still as a newly founded guild we do not have a higher level
or even a equal level bard, so I do have many questions concerning bards and
how should a bard played.


Just a curious and inexperienced bard speaking here so pls do not hesitate
to help. :P
